subject: Self Care
title: Morning Self-Compassion Check-In
description: A fast breakdown of Morning Self-Compassion Check-In for builders.

hook.text: Before checking your phone, check in with yourself. How am I feeling right now? That question changes the morning.

buildup.text: A morning check-in takes thirty seconds: notice your body, name your emotion, set a compassionate intention.

discovery.text: Starting the day with self-awareness prevents autopilot. You respond to the day instead of reacting to it.

twist.text: Most people start with tasks and emails. Starting with self-awareness means your needs set the tone, not the inbox.

climax.text: Tomorrow morning: pause, breathe, ask 'How am I?' Then set one kind intention. That's your self-compassion practice.

punchline.text: Check in with yourself before the world checks in.

quiz.question: What does a morning self-compassion check-in include?
options: Noticing body sensations, naming emotions, setting a kind intention
